summary.span: 表示服務執行個體的內容資訊。

span.span: Represents the context information for a service instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetServiceInstance() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回執行個體內容的服務執行個體。

span.span: Returns the instance of the service for the instance context.

returns.span: 代表服務執行個體的物件。

span.span: The object that represents the service instance.

exception.span: 此服務執行個體處於建立或開啟狀態，或尚未初始化。

span.span: The service instance is in a created or opening state or is not initialized.

exception.span: 服務執行個體已中止。

span.span: The service instance is aborted.

exception.span: 此服務執行個體已關閉，無法在這些狀態下修改。

span.span: The service instance has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

exception.span: 此服務執行個體發生錯誤，無法在這些狀態下修改。

span.span: The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetServiceInstance(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 觸發服務物件之建立的傳入訊息。

span.span: The incoming message that triggered the creation of a service object.

summary.span: 傳回執行個體內容的服務執行個體，以回應傳入訊息。

span.span: Returns the instance of the service for the instance context in response to an incoming message.

returns.span: 代表服務執行個體的物件。

span.span: The object that represents the service instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常見用法是您呼叫 ，只在訊息導向到達時才建立服務執行個體；若沒有訊息到達，就不會建立 與服務物件，因此實際有需要時才會部署資源。The general idea is that you only create an instance of the service when a message directed at it arrives, by calling ; then if no message arrives, no is created and no service object is created, and so resources are not deployed until actually required. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_ServiceInstanceContext#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_serviceinstancecontext/cs/snippets.cs#11)]

exception.span: 此服務執行個體處於建立或開啟狀態，或尚未初始化。

span.span: The service instance is in a created or opening state or is not initialized.

exception.span: 服務執行個體已中止。

span.span: The service instance is aborted.

exception.span: 此服務執行個體已關閉，無法在這些狀態下修改。

span.span: The service instance has been closed already and cannot be modified in these states.

exception.span: 此服務執行個體發生錯誤，無法在這些狀態下修改。

span.span: The service instance is faulted and cannot be modified in these states.

summary.span: 取得或設定執行個體內容可處理的訊息數量限制。

value.span: 執行個體內容可處理的訊息數量。

span.span: The number of messages that can be processed by the instance context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若 值成為零，就無法再處理訊息。When the value reaches zero no more messages can be processed. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_ServiceInstanceContext#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_serviceinstancecontext/cs/snippets.cs#9)]
